summary: Build a static website for the men's clothing brand Zayora including founder info (Yash Jaiswal), clickable contact/order phone numbers, and add additional imagery plus a "Products Coming Soon" section.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page static website for a men’s clothing business that clearly displays: (1) site title “Men’s Clothing Store”, (2) founder line “Founder: Yash Jaiswal”, (3) main contact number “9919031636”, and (4) ordering instruction “Order Now: 9919031626”. All user-facing text must be in English.
Make both phone numbers clickable using tel: links, and label them clearly so users can distinguish general contact vs ordering.

Apply a coherent, modern fashion-forward visual theme (not blue/purple) across the page: consistent typography, spacing, and component styling (hero/header, content sections, and contact/order callouts).

Add generated static images as assets and render them on the landing page: a simple brand logo and a wide hero/banner image that fits the chosen theme. Store images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend.

Add the brand name "Zayora" to the website branding in a prominent, consistent way (e.g., in the header/brand lockup and footer) while keeping the existing site title text "Men's Clothing Store" visible somewhere on the page.
Update the HTML document metadata to include the brand name "Zayora" (e.g., the page <title> and/or meta description) without removing the existing men’s clothing store context.

Add a new "Products Coming Soon" section to the existing single-page Zayora website, using clear English copy to indicate that the product catalog will be added later, and include a prominent call-to-action that links to the existing ordering phone number (tel:9919031626).

Add more static fashion/product imagery beyond the existing logo and hero banner by creating and rendering a small gallery/grid section on the landing page that uses newly generated images stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly from the frontend.

Add one additional information line on the landing page that clearly states that print-on-demand service is available, using correct English wording (e.g., "Print on demand available"). Place it in a prominent, visually consistent location (such as within the hero text block or near the ordering call-to-action) without removing or changing the existing required business title, founder line, or phone numbers.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a static men's clothing website page showing business title, founder info (Yash Jaiswal), main contact number (9919031636), and order contact number (9919031626).
Add the brand name "Zayora" to the website (e.g., in the header/hero branding).
Add more images to the website (beyond the existing logo and hero/banner) to enhance the page content/branding.
Add a "Products Coming Soon" section/page content to the website indicating products will be added later.
Add an additional information line/section on the website indicating "Print on demand available" (or similar wording).
